API¶

Import scReadSim as:

import scReadSim

Utility¶

scReadSim.Utility.CallPeak(macs3_directory, …)

Perform peak calling using MACS3

scReadSim.Utility.ExtractBAMCoverage(…)

Examine the covered chromosome names for the input bam file.

scReadSim.Utility.scATAC_CreateFeatureSets(…)

Create the foreground and background feature set for the input scATAC-seq bam file.

scReadSim.Utility.scRNA_CreateFeatureSets(…)

Create the foreground and background feature set for the input scRNA-seq bam file.

scReadSim.Utility.bam2countmat(…)

Construct count matrix.

scReadSim.Utility.bam2countmat_INPUT(…)

Construct count matrix for task with user input features set.

scReadSim.Utility.find_nearest(array, value)

Find the index of peak from array with a length closest to value.

scReadSim.Utility.match_peak(true_peakfile, …)

Find the reference features for the given features true_peakfile according to the similarity of peak length.

scReadSim.Utility.ComplementFeature(…)

Create background feature set given the user input foreground feature set feature_file.

scATAC_GenerateBAM¶

scReadSim.scATAC_GenerateBAM.flatten(x)

Flatten a nested list.

scReadSim.scATAC_GenerateBAM.cellbarode_generator(length)

Generate random cellbarcode.

scReadSim.scATAC_GenerateBAM.scATAC_INPUT_PerTruePeakEdition(…)

Formulate Synthetic reads for task with user input features set.

scReadSim.scATAC_GenerateBAM.scATAC_PerTruePeakEdition(…)

Formulate Synthetic reads.

scReadSim.scATAC_GenerateBAM.scATAC_SampleSyntheticReads(…)

Sample Synthetic reads.

scReadSim.scATAC_GenerateBAM.scATAC_GenerateBAMCoord(…)

Generate Synthetic reads in BED format.

scReadSim.scATAC_GenerateBAM.scATAC_SampleSyntheticReads_INPUT(…)

Sample Synthetic reads.

scReadSim.scATAC_GenerateBAM.scATAC_GenerateBAMCoord_INPUT(…)

Generate Synthetic reads in BED format.

scReadSim.scATAC_GenerateBAM.scATAC_CombineBED(…)

Combine the bed files of foreground and background feature sets into one bed file.

scReadSim.scATAC_GenerateBAM.scATAC_BED2FASTQ(…)

Convert Synthetic reads from BED to FASTQ.

scReadSim.scATAC_GenerateBAM.AlignSyntheticBam_Pair(…)

Convert Synthetic reads from FASTQ to BAM.
